DOC.brief_title: Study ASTRA TECH Implant System , Short Implants ( OsseoSpeed™ ) Compared Standard Length Implants ( OsseoSpeed™ ) With Bone Substitution
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent Aged 2075 year enrolment History edentulism study area least four month In need 14 implant either side posterior maxilla ( premolar molar region ) Neighboring tooth/teeth plan implant/s must natural root ( ) implant support restoration , absence pathology excessive bone loss , judge investigator Presence natural tooth/teeth , partial prosthesis and/or implant opposite jaw contact plan crown/s Deemed investigator bone height 5 7 mm bone width minimum 6 mm Deemed investigator likely present initially stable implant situation Unlikely able comply study procedure , judge investigator Earlier bone graft procedure study area Uncontrolled pathologic process oral cavity Known suspect current malignancy History radiation therapy head neck region History chemotherapy within 5 year prior surgery Systemic local disease condition could compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus Corticosteroids , iv bisphosphonates medication could influence postoperative healing and/or osseointegration Smoking 10 cigarettes/day Bruxism Present alcohol and/or drug abuse Involvement planning conduct study ( applies Astra Tech staff staff study site ) Previous enrolment present study Simultaneous participation another clinical study
